sourceMeaningMnemonic: Set <radical>fire</radical> to a <radical>geoduck</radical> if you want to <kanji>annoy</kanji> it. Fire won't kill a geoduck, but have you ever been on fire? It's not really pleasant. So you'll just annoy it pretty badly.
meaningInfo: Imagine how annoyed you would be if someone set YOU on fire for no reason. The geoduck has every reason to find you annoying, dude.
readingMnemonic: You know who loves <kanji>annoying</kanji> geoducks more than anyone else in the universe? <reading>Han</reading> (<ja>はん</ja>) Solo! If you watch Star Wars closely enough you can see him shooting geoducks with his blaster and catching them on fire for fun.
readingInfo: Think how annoying it must be to be a geoduck when Han Solo comes around.
